content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to play games, but I am trained on vast amounts of data which includes information about games like God of War. God of War is a critically acclaimed action-adventure game series developed by Santa Monica Studio and initially released in 2005. The series follows the story of Kratos, a Spartan warrior who sets on a journey to destroy the Greek gods. The latest game in the series, God of War (2018), which is a soft reboot of the franchise, was praised for its storytelling, graphics, and gameplay mechanics, and won various Game of the Year awards. With God of War Ragnarok, many gamers are eagerly anticipating the continuation of Kratos' journey, and it will be interesting to see how the game shapes up.
